author: desruisseaux
msg: Change in the contract of DefaultOperationMethod.redimension(...).
The javadoc tries to explain better its purpose, with "Affine" and "Molodensky" methods as examples.
This is an incompatible change compared to Apache SIS 0.5 release, but this class was the very last
one added before the release (maybe too late) and we hope that since it will not be used before SIS
